ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rrxval.r | |- H = ( RR^ ` I ) |
| 2 |  | rrxbase.b | |- B = ( Base ` H ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_rrxval | |- ( I e. V -> H = ( toCHil ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( I e. V -> ( Base ` H ) = ( Base ` ( toCHil ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( toCHil ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) = ( toCHil ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) = ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_tchbas | |- ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) = ( Base ` ( toCHil ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( I e. V -> ( Base ` H ) = ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( I e. V -> B = ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_refld | |- RRfld e. Field |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( RRfld freeLMod I ) = ( RRfld freeLMod I ) |
| 12 |  | #P_rebase | |- RR = ( Base ` RRfld ) |
| 13 |  | #P_re0g | |- 0 = ( 0g ` RRfld ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- { f e. ( RR ^m I ) | f finSupp 0 } = { f e. ( RR ^m I ) | f finSupp 0 } |
| 15 | 11, 12, 13, 14 | #P_frlmbas | |- ( ( RRfld e. Field /\ I e. V ) -> { f e. ( RR ^m I ) | f finSupp 0 } = ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_mpan | |- ( I e. V -> { f e. ( RR ^m I ) | f finSupp 0 } = ( Base ` ( RRfld freeLMod I ) ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 9, 16 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( I e. V -> B = { f e. ( RR ^m I ) | f finSupp 0 } ) |
